body_html:
I got the same question with you,since I installed tensorflow-gpu yestarday.The tf version is 1.2,and my gpu card is gtx1060. Although the CUDA and cuDNN info is not shown, it seems that the GPU is still working , my demo is running much faster then before.
However, I just want to make sure too.

body:
I got the same question with you,since I installed tensorflow-gpu yestarday.The tf version is 1.2,and my gpu card is gtx1060. Although the CUDA and cuDNN info is not shown,  it seems that the GPU is  still working , my demo is running much faster then before.
However, I just want to make sure too.
